text.content:
Create new page "Notion Onboarding Guide" in root
 **Section 1: Getting Started (5 min read)**
 **Section 2: Database Overview (10 min read)**
 **Section 3: Common Tasks (15 min)**
 **Section 4: Mobile Tips**
 **Section 5: FAQ**
 Add screenshots for key workflows
 Include video walkthrough (optional, 5-10 min Loom recording)
 Get Arbak to review draft
 Schedule 30-minute session with Arbak
 **Agenda:**
 **Hands-on Exercises:**
 Record any questions/confusion points
 Give Arbak onboarding guide link for reference
 **Week 1: Read-Only Access**
 **Week 2: Edit Access on Assigned Tasks (planned)**
 **Week 3: Full Edit Access (if needed)**
 Document permission rationale in onboarding guide
 Add note: "If you need to update task, edit markdown file or ask Arsen"
 **Favorites Setup:**
 **Create Mobile-Optimized Views:**
 **Set up Quick Add Widget (iOS/Android):**
 **Test Offline Mode:**
 **Document Mobile Tips:**
 **Create Feedback Form (Notion page or Google Form):**
 **Schedule Weekly Check-Ins:**
 **Track Usage Patterns:**
 **Document Friction Points:**
 **Identify Quick Wins:**
 **Review Feedback:** Categorize into themes
 **Implement Top 3 Improvements:**
 **Adjust Views as Needed:**
 **Optimize Workflows:**
 **Communicate Changes:**

text.content:
Log into https://www.notion.com/my-integrations
 Create new integration "AI Admin v2 - Claude Code (2025)"
 Copy new token
 Update `.mcp.json` with new token
 Test @notion MCP connection
 Revoke old token
 Document rotation date in context.md
 Open Notion workspace
 Click "+ New"  "Database"  "Table" (or use Projects template)
 Name: "Projects" with  icon
 Add properties:
 Save database ID to context.md
 Create new database "Tasks" with  icon
 Add properties:
 Set up bidirectional relation with Projects
 Save database ID to context.md
 Create new database "Knowledge Base" with  icon
 Add properties:
 Save database ID to context.md
 **View 1: Active Projects** (Kanban by Status)
 **View 2: Timeline** (Timeline view)
 **View 3: By Phase** (Grouped table)
 Set "Active Projects" as default view
 **View 1: My Tasks** (Personal filter)
 **View 2: Current Sprint** (Active work)
 **View 3: Backlog** (Planning)
 **View 4: Completed** (History)
 Set "My Tasks" as default view
 Navigate to project root
 Run: `npm install @notionhq/client`
 Verify installation in package.json
 Create test script to verify import:
 Run test script
 Create `scripts/notion-log-deployment.js`
 Import Notion SDK
 Parse command-line arguments:
 Implement main function
 Add error handling (try-catch with detailed logging)
 Add retry logic (3 attempts with exponential backoff)
 Test with mock data
 Create `.github/workflows/notion-deploy-log.yml`
 Configure trigger on deployment events:
 Add job to log deployment:
 Add NOTION_TOKEN to GitHub Secrets
 Add NOTION_PROJECTS_DB to GitHub Secrets
 Test with actual deployment (or workflow_dispatch trigger)
 Trigger 3 test deployments (or simulate with workflow_dispatch)
 Verify all 3 logged correctly in Notion Projects database
 Check all properties present: Name, Status, Date, Notes

text.content:
Phase 0: 62% under estimate (3h vs 8h)
 Phase 1: 81% under estimate (4h vs 21.5h)
 Overall: 80% under estimate (7h vs 35.5h)
 **Same-day completion:** Started and finished 2025-11-15
 253 tasks successfully synced
 0.030 req/sec API rate (136x safety margin)
 PM2 cron: Every 15 min (8am-11pm) + Nightly (2am)
 Health: HEALTHY
 Zero downtime deployment
 One-way sync (markdown = source of truth)
 Smart change detection (skip unchanged)
 Atomic state writes (temp + rename)
 Lockfile protection (prevent concurrent runs)
 Graceful error handling (continue on failures)
 Production monitoring (health check + Telegram)
 All 3 databases created (Projects, Tasks, Knowledge Base)
 Markdown parser built (385 lines, handles all edge cases)
 Project sync handler built (417 lines, create/update projects + tasks)
 Sync orchestrator built (460 lines, smart change detection)
 Health check script built (388 lines, monitors sync system)
 PM2 cron automation configured (every 15 min + nightly)
 Emergency sync guide created (docs/NOTION_EMERGENCY_SYNC.md)
 Architecture documentation created (docs/NOTION_SYNC_ARCHITECTURE.md)
 CLAUDE.md updated with Notion integration section
 253 tasks successfully synced across 3 active projects
 API rate: 0.030 req/sec (136x under limit)
 BullMQ deferred (not needed - current performance excellent)
 Notion SDK installed & tested
 Deployment logging script working
 GitHub Actions workflow ready
 Client Reactivation Service v2 imported
 POC Evaluation Checklist created
  Views deferred (create manually when needed)
